welcome_message_body: Welcome to Uruma, Japan! Get ready to experience the unique blend of traditional culture, stunning beaches, and delicious local cuisine that this charming city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Uruma has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: BAKERY ADEMOK うるま店
restaurants.description: BAKERY ADEMOK うるま店 is a bakery located in うるま市.

restaurants.name: スシロー (スシロー うるまみどり町店)
restaurants.description: スシロー (スシロー うるまみどり町店) is a sushi restaurant located in うるま市.

restaurants.name: King Tacos (キングタコス あげな店)
restaurants.description: King Tacos (キングタコス あげな店) is a taco restaurant located in うるま市.
restaurants.address: みどり町4-20-1 (ロイヤルマンション具志川 1F), うるま市, 沖縄県, 904-2215

restaurants.name: MOS BURGER (モスバーガー)
restaurants.description: MOS BURGER (モスバーガー) is a fast food restaurant located in うるま市.

restaurants.name: ドミノ・ピザ 安慶名店
restaurants.description: ドミノ・ピザ 安慶名店 is a pizzeria located in うるま市.
restaurants.address: みどり町5-3-4, うるま市, 沖縄県, 904-2215

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Kadena AB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations at Kadena AB Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Naha Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It is a modern and spacious terminal with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Naha Airport handles flights within Japan. It is a smaller terminal with a more limited selection of shops and restaurants compared to the main terminal.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Naha Airport serves flights to and from other countries. It is a modern and well-equipped terminal with a variety of shops, restaurants, and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Iejima Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Iejima Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
